description: This hook is used to manage the open state and keyboard navigation of accordions.

props.description: Default expanded state of the accordion
props.name: defaultExpanded

returnType.description: Function that takes in index or id of element and returns expanded boolean
returnType.name: isIndexExpanded

returnType.description: Function that handles on key down for navigation
returnType.name: onKeyNavigation

returnType.description: Ref object to use if ref isn't supplied in props
returnType.name: ref

returnType.description: Callback to toggle accordion expanded state
returnType.name: toggleIndexExpanded
